QuestData.Title: Felsworn Gas Mask
QuestData.Description: I have a very special mission for you, $n. I need you to infiltrate Forge Camp: Anger east of here. When you enter the camp you will need to wear the Felsworn gas mask and locate the Legion communicator. Once you have located the communication device speak with whomever is on the other side of the device.$B$BIf all works out you can trick the demon into something devious! Try telling the demon that Camp Anger has revolted.$B$BGood luck to you $C.
QuestData.LogDescription: Wear the Felsworn Gas Mask and use the Legion Communicator at Forge Camp: Anger in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: What's the meaning of this! No one summons me! Speak, or I will silence you forever!
